body:
New Feature

Network Modeling: Custom Attributes
  • Network Modeling now supports Custom Attributes:
    • Clients may use their own data to support their modeling needs.
    • Attributes may be associated with Providers and Provider Locations.
    • A variety of data types are supported.
  • For more information, please contact Sales.Analytics@Zelis.com.
  • NOTE: Custom Attributes, along with Network Modeling, will not be configured until coordinated.

Updates

  • Three references have been added to the Help page for the Recruiting tab:
    • What information is on the Recruiting tab?
    • How is the comprehensive Recruiting list determined?
    • Can I export the provider list on the Recruiting tab?
